text: The men's 50 kilometres walk competition of the athletics events at the 1979 Pan American Games took place at the Estadio Sixto Escobar. Full results ==Records== Prior to this competition, the existing world and Pan American Games records were as follows: {| class="wikitable" |- |World record | |3:41:20 |Poděbrady, Czechoslovakia |June 11, 1978 |- |Pan American Games record | |4:26:20.8 |Winnipeg, Canada |1967 |} ==Results== {| class="wikitable" style="margin:0.5em auto; font-size:90%;position:relative;" width=68% |- |KEY: |align=center|WR||World Record |align=center|GR||Pan American Record |} {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Rank !Name !Nation !Time !Notes |- | |Raúl González | |4:05:17 |GR |- | |Martín Bermúdez | |4:11:13 | |- | |Marco Evoniuk | |4:24:23 | |- |4 |Ernesto Alfaro | |4:39:36 | |- |5 |Vince O'Sullivan | |4:44:20 | |- |6 |Nicolás Soto | |4:51:40 | |- |7 |Henry Klein | |5:17:01 | |- | |Marcel Jobin | | | |} ==References== Category:Athletics at the 1979 Pan American Games
title: Athletics at the 1979 Pan American Games – Men's 50 kilometres walk
